title: Looking For Team: Platinum ADC/JG Main, Coming from Professional Dota 2 Play
body:
Age: 16
Currently Platinum 5 with high platinum elo. Started ranked this season, maining ADC. Can play any ADC but Draven, but preferred are Ezreal, Kai'sa and Kalista. 
Also play jg, maining Jax, Zac and Evelynn.
Previously played as Flair Gaming's Pos 1 (carry) player, peaking at team ranking 7th best in Oceania, so I have experience in a professional environment and team play. Been learning LoL and now have about 1.5k games total, with around 120 in ranked. 
OP.GG: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=fangere123 
Can also play midlane at plat level, but champion pool is very limited (Ryze, Corki and Ekko)

Looking to enter a team environment in LoL, and see what experiences I get out of that and where it takes me.
